customrecordcustomfield.help: Stores the Account Value information that is provided by Avalara. This is what will be used for performing all the operations with AvaTax services.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Account Value

customrecordcustomfield.help: Stores the License Key value that is provided by Avalara.This is what will be used for performing all the operations with AvaTax services.
customrecordcustomfield.label: License Key

customrecordcustomfield.help: Stores the AvaTax Service URL value that is provided by Avalara. This is what will be used for performing all the operations with AvaTax services.
customrecordcustomfield.label: URL

customrecordcustomfield.help: Stores the Expiry Date of the credentials after verification by AvaTax services.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Expiry Date

customrecordcustomfield.help: Used as an option to pass the Items User Defined values that are mapped to AvaTax services.
customrecordcustomfield.label: User Defined 1

customrecordcustomfield.help: Used as an option to pass the Items User Defined values that are mapped to AvaTax services.
customrecordcustomfield.label: User Defined 2

customrecordcustomfield.help: Option used to pass the Account number that is assigned for an Inventory Items.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Send Item Account to AvaTax
Disable Synchronization of Items to Avalara

customrecordcustomfield.help: 0-Blank 1-New and Existing Customer(s) 2-Only New customer(s) 3-Only Existing Customer(s)
customrecordcustomfield.label: Default Customer Taxcode

customrecordcustomfield.help: Entity Use codes are used to indicate reason for Exemption or can be used at an Entity level for broad Taxability overrides.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Enable Entity/Use Code

customrecordcustomfield.help: Option used to control the taxability of Freight.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Default Shipping Code

customrecordcustomfield.help: 0 - None 1 - Only Warnings 2 - Only Errors 3 - Both
customrecordcustomfield.label: Show Warnings/Errors

customrecordcustomfield.help: Option used to disable Tax calculation using AvaTax services.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Disable Tax Calculation
Disable Tax Calculation for Sales Order

customrecordcustomfield.help: Option used to disable tax calculation at add/edit/delete of lines in the transactions using AvaTax services.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Disable line item level Tax Calculation

customrecordcustomfield.help: Option used to hide/unhide a button in the transaction screen. When this option is exercised, will make a call to AvaTax services for calculating Tax for details in the document.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Enable Tax on Demand
Use Invoice Address on Returns for Tax Calculation
Use Bill To Address For Tax Calculation
Auto Self Assess on Imported Vendor bills
